DOC.brief_summary: A single site , blind , randomize , control study design examine glycemic metabolic response frozen yogurt contain Saskatoon berry powder healthy male female .
DOC.brief_title: Glycemic Metabolic Responses Frozen Yogurt Containing Saskatoon Berry Powder Healthy Males Females
DOC.detailed_description: A single site , blind , randomize , control study design examine glycemic metabolic response frozen yogurt contain Saskatoon berry powder healthy male female . Eligible participant ask attend 4 in-person clinic visit comparative test frozen yogurt frozen yogurt contain Saskatoon berry powder versus white bread . Separate visit screen fast blood sample also request ( total 6 visit ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male , nonpregnant , nonlactating female , ≥18 ≤35 year ; 2 . Normal blood lipid profile , creatinine < 1.5× upper limit normal ( ULN ) normal range ≥7 units/L ≤56 units/L , alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) < 2× ULN normal range ≥0.7 mg/dL ≤1.3 mg/dL , glycated hemoglobin < 6 % ; 3 . Blood pressure < 140/90 4 . Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥20 < 30 ; 5 . Stable regime past 3 month take vitamin mineral/dietary/ herbal supplement ; 6 . Agree eat Saskatoon berry food contain Saskatoon berry participate study ; 7 . Willing comply protocol requirement ; 8 . Willing provide inform consent . 1 . Not able consume yogurt allergy Saskatoon berry ingredient yogurt bread ; 2 . Presence clinically diagnose disease affect circulatory , respiratory , immune , skeletal , urinary , muscular , endocrine , digestive , nervous reproductive system require medical treatment ; 3 . Taking prescribed medication last 3 month supplement affect gastrointestinal function last 3 month ; 4 . Weight loss ≥3 kg body weight within 6 month prior enrol study ; 5 . Current ( within last month ) bacterial , viral fungal infection , overthecounter medication within past 72 hour ; 6 . Unable obtain blood sample screen first study visit .
